Video.title: 1st day diet
Video.content: if you don't have enough time, you just need to eat right to loose weight on the first day.

section.title: Breakfast
section.content: Blend 1 cup frozen berries, 1/2 banana, and 8 ounces of low- or fat-free milk into a smoothie. Grab 1 or 2 hard-boiled eggs on your way out the door.

section.title: Lunch
section.content: Heat up 1 cup vegetarian vegetable soup and serve with 1 veggie burger on a slice of, whole grain and seed toast, or English muffin and 1 cup of grapes.

section.title: Dinner
section.content: Brush 4 ounces boneless, skinless chicken breast with barbecue sauce and grill. Combine 2 heaping cups of sautéed spinach with garlic, olive oil, and tomatoes and serve with 1/2 plain baked or sweet potato (as desired).

Video.title: 2st day diet
Video.content: if you don't have enough time, you just need to eat right to loose weight on the first day.

section.title: Breakfast
section.content: Combine 3/4 cup bran flakes, 1 banana, and 1 cup fat-free milk in a bowl.

section.title: Lunch
section.content: Build a sandwich with 1 mini whole wheat pita, 3 ounces turkey breast, 1/2 roasted pepper, 1 teaspoon mayo, mustard, and lettuce. Serve with 1 stick part-skim mozzarella string cheese and 2 kiwis.

section.title: Dinner
section.content: Serve 4 ounces broiled flounder or sole with 2 sliced plum tomatoes sprinkled with 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, broiled until just golden. Eat with 1 cup cooked couscous and 1 cup steamed broccoli. Enjoy with a single-serve ice cream (like any of these delicious picks!) for dessert.

Video.title: 3st day diet
Video.content: if you don't have enough time, you just need to eat right to loose weight.

section.title: Breakfast
section.content: To make a chicken salad, toss 4 ounces shredded skinless roast chicken breast with 1/4 cup sliced red grapes, 1 tablespoon slivered almonds, 1 tablespoon mayonnaise, and 1 tablespoon plain, unsweetened Greek yogurt. Serve over lettuce. Eat with 1 banana

section.title: Lunch
section.content: Heat up 1 cup vegetarian vegetable soup and serve with 1 veggie burger on a slice of, whole grain and seed toast, or English muffin and 1 cup of grapes.

section.title: Dinner
section.content: Brush 4 ounces boneless, skinless chicken breast with barbecue sauce and grill. Combine 2 heaping cups of sautéed spinach with garlic, olive oil, and tomatoes and serve with 1/2 plain baked or sweet potato (as desired).

Video.title: 5st day diet
Video.content: if you don't have enough time, you just need to eat right to loose weight.

section.title: Breakfast
section.content: Blend 1 cup frozen berries, 1/2 banana, and 8 ounces of low- or fat-free milk into a smoothie. Grab 1 or 2 hard-boiled eggs on your way out the door.

section.title: Lunch
section.content: Heat up 1 cup vegetarian vegetable soup and serve with 1 veggie burger on a slice of, whole grain and seed toast, or English muffin and 1 cup of grapes.

section.content: Brush 4 ounces boneless, skinless chicken breast with barbecue sauce and grill. Combine 2 heaping cups of sautéed spinach with garlic, olive oil, and tomatoes and serve with 1/2 plain baked or sweet potato (as desired).

section.title: Breakfast
section.content: Blend 1 cup frozen berries, 1/2 banana, and 8 ounces of low- or fat-free milk into a smoothie. Grab 1 or 2 hard-boiled eggs on your way out the door.

section.title: Lunch
section.content: Heat up 1 cup vegetarian vegetable soup and serve with 1 veggie burger on a slice of, whole grain and seed toast, or English muffin and 1 cup of grapes.

section.content: Brush 4 ounces boneless, skinless chicken breast with barbecue sauce and grill. Combine 2 heaping cups of sautéed spinach with garlic, olive oil, and tomatoes and serve with 1/2 plain baked or sweet potato (as desired).

Video.title: 2st day diet
Video.content: if you don't have enough time, you just need to eat right to loose weight on the first day.

section.title: Breakfast
section.content: Combine 3/4 cup bran flakes, 1 banana, and 1 cup fat-free milk in a bowl.

section.title: Lunch
section.content: Build a sandwich with 1 mini whole wheat pita, 3 ounces turkey breast, 1/2 roasted pepper, 1 teaspoon mayo, mustard, and lettuce. Serve with 1 stick part-skim mozzarella string cheese and 2 kiwis.

section.title: Dinner
section.content: Serve 4 ounces broiled flounder or sole with 2 sliced plum tomatoes sprinkled with 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, broiled until just golden. Eat with 1 cup cooked couscous and 1 cup steamed broccoli. Enjoy with a single-serve ice cream (like any of these delicious picks!) for dessert.

Video.title: 3st day diet
Video.content: if you don't have enough time, you just need to eat right to loose weight.

section.title: Breakfast
section.content: To make a chicken salad, toss 4 ounces shredded skinless roast chicken breast with 1/4 cup sliced red grapes, 1 tablespoon slivered almonds, 1 tablespoon mayonnaise, and 1 tablespoon plain, unsweetened Greek yogurt. Serve over lettuce. Eat with 1 banana

section.title: Lunch
section.content: Heat up 1 cup vegetarian vegetable soup and serve with 1 veggie burger on a slice of, whole grain and seed toast, or English muffin and 1 cup of grapes.

section.title: Dinner
section.content: Brush 4 ounces boneless, skinless chicken breast with barbecue sauce and grill. Combine 2 heaping cups of sautéed spinach with garlic, olive oil, and tomatoes and serve with 1/2 plain baked or sweet potato (as desired).
